com.warzone - package com.warzone
This is the root package of the project.
com.warzone.controller - package com.warzone.controller
Contains game engine and commands which are needed to start execution.
com.warzone.controller.state - package com.warzone.controller.state
Phases of the game.
com.warzone.controller.state.edit - package com.warzone.controller.state.edit
Edit phase which contains PreEdit and PostEdit class to load map in edit mode and to edit the loaded map.
com.warzone.controller.state.gamephase - package com.warzone.controller.state.gamephase
Game phase contains sub phases which are GameSetup, GamePlay and end phase.
com.warzone.controller.state.gamephase.endphase - package com.warzone.controller.state.gamephase.endphase
End phase is set when just one player remains excluding neutralPlayer#1, winner is printed in this phase.
com.warzone.controller.state.gamephase.gameplay - package com.warzone.controller.state.gamephase.gameplay
Contains classes required to play the game like issue orders which takes orders from players, execute orders which executes the orders provided by players.
com.warzone.controller.state.gamephase.gamesetup - package com.warzone.controller.state.gamephase.gamesetup
Contains methods used to set the necessary elements to play the game like load map, add or remove player and assigncountries.
com.warzone.elements - package com.warzone.elements
Contains basic elements used in the game like countries, continents, map and player.
com.warzone.elements.map - package com.warzone.elements.map
Contains map operations related to map.
com.warzone.elements.orders - package com.warzone.elements.orders
Contains all the orders which the user provides during game phase
com.warzone.elements.savegameplay - package com.warzone.elements.savegameplay
 
com.warzone.strategy - package com.warzone.strategy
Contains four types of strategy of player: Random, Cheater Aggressive, Benevolent and Human.

createOrder() - Method in class com.warzone.strategy.Aggressive
This Method is used to create orders based on play of aggressive player.
createOrder() - Method in class com.warzone.strategy.Benevolent
This method is used to create orders to deploy on its weakest country moves its armies in order to reinforce its weaker country
createOrder() - Method in class com.warzone.strategy.Cheater
This method is used to implement logic of acquiring neighbouring countries and doubling armies for the Cheater Player.
createOrder() - Method in class com.warzone.strategy.HumanPlayer
This method is used to create orders deploys on a country, attacks neighboring countries and moves armies between its countries plays cards according to its needs
createOrder() - Method in class com.warzone.strategy.PlayerStrategy
This method is implemented by strategy classes
createOrder() - Method in class com.warzone.strategy.RandomPlayer
This method creates random orders, deploys on a random country attacks random neighboring countries moves armies randomly between its countries
